Cleverbot3.py
============

Cleverbot3 is a Python 3 portage from folz Python 2 Cleverbot.py

A Python 3 wrapper over the Cleverbot API
---------------------------------------

Any contribution is welcomed.

Usage
-----

```
import cleverbot

cb1 = cleverbot.Cleverbot()
print(cb1.ask('Hi. How are you?'))
```
